sentences.english: Much more rainfall will be needed before droughty conditions are alleviated.
sentences.chinese: 棉區需要更多降雨以緩解旱情。

sentences.english: A saturating rain was expected to end the drought.
sentences.chinese: 只盼下場透雨，解除旱情。

sentences.english: There are technologies to alleviate drought of crops by precipitating rainfall.
sentences.chinese: 目前已通過利用層積雲降雨的方式來緩解莊稼的旱情。

sentences.english: "The Drought Distribution in HHH Plain"and other results were obtained.
sentences.chinese: 從而得到所需的研究區旱情分佈圖等不同形式的結果。

sentences.english: But the moderate precipitation was unlikely to end the drought, experts said.
sentences.chinese: 但是，溫和的降水是不可能結束的旱情，專家說。

sentences.english: Meteorologist Zhou Yuehua said La Nina was to blame for the drought.
sentences.chinese: 氣象學家周月華表示，拉尼娜是造成旱情的原因。

sentences.english: We had a bit of a drought last summer thanks to the heat-wave.
sentences.chinese: 去年夏天，由於酷暑我們遭受了輕微的旱情。

sentences.english: Li says the  drought has served as a reality check on the importance of water conservation.
sentences.chinese: 他表示，旱情真實地驗證了節約用水的重要性。

sentences.english: Some Chinese are even pointing to the dam as a direct cause of the drought.
sentences.chinese: 一些中國人甚至指出三峽大壩是導致旱情的直接原因。

sentences.english: Artificial means were employed to create rain in at least 7 provinces during the past weekend to alleviate the rare drought.
sentences.chinese: 上週末，至少7個省實施了人工降雨，以緩解旱情。

sentences.english: It is shown that the method of Z index cloud amount is effective.
sentences.chinese: 分析表明，用雲參數的Z指標法監測旱情是可行的。

sentences.english: An extreme cycle of drought in the Horn of Africa has pushed millions into hunger.
sentences.chinese: 非洲之角地區的一波極端旱情導致數百萬人陷入飢餓。

sentences.english: Since we were experiencing a drought on the island, the rain was a welcome relief.
sentences.chinese: 島上正值乾旱，所以這場及時雨使旱情得到了緩解。

sentences.english: A month's continuous high-temperature climate tipped the drought in Jiangxi Province over the edge into more seriousness.
sentences.chinese: 一個月的持續高溫使江西省的旱情更加嚴重。

definition: the state of moisture in the soil (and whether it can support a crop)
disaster-stricken/to be hit by a natural calamity
insect damage/destruction of crops by pest insects
